mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (comment_no, board_no, comment_content, employee_no, comment_date) VALUES (#{commentNo}, #{boardNo}, #{commentContent}, #{employeeNo}, sysDate)
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET comment_content = #{commentContent}, comment_date = sysDate WHERE comment_no = #{commentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT comment_no, board_no, comment_content, comment_write, comment_date FROM comments WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY comment_no ASC
